name: Soundcloud The Concert: The Game
description:
Beat based boss battle but you rescue a soundcloud rapper instead!

Arrow keys to move. R to Restart.

Run into the robot when there are green sparks to fix it.

All made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a loop.

Warning the bass is very loud, as Soulja Boy once said "TURN YO SPEAKERS DOWN!"
